item.title: Lil Nas X,Rap Monster - Old Town Road (Seoul Town Road Remix)

take my horse

road

’til I can’t no more

take my horse

road

hat is matte black

in the valley

item.title: Lil Nas X,Jac.. - INDUSTRY BABY
item.description:
Baby back ayy
couple racks ayy
Couple Grammys on him
couple plaques ayy
That’s a fact ayy
throw it back ayy
Throw it back
ayy
And this one is
for the champions
I ain’t lost
since I began yeah
Funny how you said
it was the end yeah
Then I went did it
again yeah
I told you long ago
on the road
I got
what they waiting for
I don’t run
from nothing dog
Get
your soldiers
Tell ’em
I ain’t layin’ low
You was never really
rooting for me anyway
When I’m back up
at the top
I wanna hear
you say
He don’t run
from nothin’ dog
Get
your soldiers
Tell ’em
that the break is over
Uh need to uh need to
get this album done
Need a couple
number ones

on every song

with Nicki now

like Bieber hah
I don’t fxxx bxxxxxx

But these nxxxxx
bxxxxxx like Madea

ayy

my new sxxx

everybody tryna sue me

Nas

for the champions

since I began yeah

again yeah

My track record
so clean

let the world gas me
It’s

‘Cause
I’m here to stay
And these girls know

I sent her back
to her boyfriend
With my handprint

we takin’ notes

but he can’t get close

rumors

‘Cause they got old

I make vets feel
like they juniors

But
just like Oklahoma
